descriptions.project: Project management system is an app helping individual person in a team or developers group to achieve assigned tasks.
descriptions.course: The online course `React developing`. It is a cost-free course by The Rolling Scopes community. The course is for students having knowledge and practical experience of using the following tools and technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, Git / GitHub, NPM, Webpack, CSS3 / HTML5, Chrome DevTools, Figma, REST API.
descriptions.team: The present app is developed by Anton Kachan, Dinmukhamed Sailaubek, Dilbar Akkaya.
